tuv.seg: Pre-school education and childcare
Oideachas Réamhscoile agus Cúram Leanaí
Overview Document Your childcare options Describes the different types of child care which are available to parents including creches, childminders, pre-schools

Overview Document Do roghanna maidir le cúram leanaí Tá cur síos ann ar na cineálacha éagsúla cúram leanaí atá ar fáil do thuismitheoirí, idir naíolanna, feighlithe leanaí agus réamhscoileanna, cuir i gcás
Early Start is a programme designed to boost educational achievement among disadvantaged three- and four-year-old children
Clár a cuireadh le chéile le cumas oideachais páistí 3 bliana agus 4 bliana ó cheantair faoi mhíbhuntáiste é Túsluath
Information on childhood education, including the role of the Department of Education and Skills
Eolas ar luathoideachais an pháiste, an ról atá ag an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna, polasaí an rialtais agus rialacháin cúram leanaí
Regulation of pre-school childcare services
Rialúchán na soláthraithe seirbhísí chúram leanaí réamhscoile
Pre-school childcare providers are regulated by law
Tá soláthróirí chúram páistí réamhscolaíochta in Éirinn rialaithe ag an dlí
Find out about the rules concerning play groups, day nurseries,crèches, childminders and other service providers
Faigh eolas maidir le rialacha a bhaineann le naíonraí, naíolanna lae, creiseanna, feighlithe páistí agus soláthróirí seirbhíse eile
Early Childhood Care and Education Scheme
Scéim Cúraim agus Oideachais Luath-Óige
The ECCE scheme provides a free year of early childhood care and education for children of pre-school age
Is í aidhm na scéime ná bliain cúraim agus oideachais luathóige a sholáthar saor in aisce do leanaí atá in aois réamhscolaíochta
Community Childcare Subvention (CCS) Programme
Clár Fóirdheontais Chúram Leanaí Pobail (CCS)
The CCS Programme supports disadvantaged parents and parents in training, education or low paid employment to access childcare at reduced rates
The CCS Programme supports disadvantaged parents and parents in training, education or low paid employment to access childcare at reduced rates
Childcare during vocational training
Cúram Leanaí le linn cúrsaí gairmoiliúna
You may qualify for a subsidised childcare place, if you are attending certain types of vocational training provided by an Education and Training Board (ETB), Momentum or Community Employment
Tá scéim chúraim leanaí ann do dhaoine atá ag freastal ar chlár oiliúna gairme de chuid FÁS
This document is in: Education and Training > Vocational education and training
This document is in: Oideachas agus Oiliúint > Gairmoideachas agus oiliúint
Community Employment Childcare Programme
An Clár Fostaíocht Pobail um Chúram Leanaí
Provides childcare places at reduced rates for Community Employment (CE) applicants who need childcare so that they can take up a place on a CE scheme

Soláthraíonn sé áiteanna i gcúram leanaí ar rátaí laghdaithe d’iarratasóirí ar an gclár Fostaíocht Pobail (CE) a dteastaíonn cúram leanaí uathu ionas gur féidir leo glacadh le háit ar scéim fostaíocht pobail
After-School Child Care Scheme
An Scéim Cúram Leanaí Iarscoile

If you have been unemployed and you get a new job, increase the number of hours that you work or take up a place on an employment support scheme you may be eligible for a subsidised afterschool childcare place for primary school children

Más rud é go raibh tú dífhostaithe agus go bhfaigheann tú post nua, nó go méadaíonn tú líon na laethanta a oibríonn tú nó go dtéann tú i mbun scéim tacaíocht fostaíochta, is féidir go mbeidh tú incháilithe d’áit fhóirdheonaithe i gcúram leanaí do leanaí bunscoile
This document is in: Social Welfare > Social welfare payments > Social welfare payments and work
This document is in: Leas Sóisialach > Íocaíochtaí Leasa Shóisialaigh > Íocaíochtaí Leasa Shóisialaigh agus Obair
